pullrequest.title: Legacy/current behavior of model level composition

content.raw: I don't believe those check for the validity of the links referenced by a joint's `<parent>` and `<child>` elements. I originally meant that `libsdformat` doesn't check the validity of links specifically for nested models. Looking at the code, I don't think there is any validation even for non-nested models. I tested with `ign sdf -k` and I don't get any errors. I also tested with `ign gazebo`, but the error is generated by `ign-physics`, not `libsdformat`.
content.html: I don't believe those check for the validity of the links referenced by a joint's <parent> and <child> elements. I originally meant that libsdformat doesn't check the validity of links specifically for nested models. Looking at the code, I don't think there is any validation even for non-nested models. I tested with ign sdf -k and I don't get any errors. I also tested with ign gazebo, but the error is generated by ign-physics, not libsdformat.
